title: Is America Really ‘Rounding the Turn’ on COVID-19?
subtitle: We fact-checked the claims of those who sought to downplay the seriousness of the pandemic in the weeks prior to the 2020 presidential election.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: As of late October 2020, the U.S. had reached its peak total of COVID-19 cases and was seeing a steady decrease in positive tests since then.
